name: Bolchetrick - Communism Tale
description:
Communism is in danger ! You need to promote communism by convincing your neighbours.

To do so, you must harass them on the phone and put posters on the wall. The glory of Mother Russia is on your hands !

Use the mouse to interact with the game world.

Made during the GGJ18 by the Bolzano Team : Jérémy Briant, Yann David, Antoine Jego and Yohan Chenebaud.
